segments.text: Mr . : For tomorrow , read pages 12 to 20 . Then do exercises one through ten on page 21 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do we have to type out our homework ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mr . : No . You only do that when you write reports .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr . : For those of you who don't have a calculator , get one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are allowed to use a calculator in class ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mr . : Yes . By the way , review today's notes this evening . We may have a small quiz tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1
